summary.span: 提供允许应用程序读写 XPS 文档组件的类型。

span.span: Provides types that allow applications to read and write the components of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了表示文档主要部分的接口和类型外 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] ， 命名空间还提供对打包过程的控制，包括数字签名和 RIGHTS MANAGEMENT (DRM) 文档的数字签名 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 。In addition to the interfaces and the types that represent the major parts of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, the namespace provides control over the packaging process, including digital signatures and Digital Rights Management (DRM) of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. 有关详细信息，请参阅 XML 纸张规格 (XPS) 可供下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For more information, see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions
